text: Gustavo Javier Aprile Retta (born August 10, 1988 in Montevideo, Uruguay) is an Uruguayan footballer. He currently plays for Liverpool in the Primera División in Uruguay. ==Teams== * Racing de Montevideo 2009-2011 * Bella Vista 2011-2012 * F.C. Bari 1908 2012-2013 * Cerro Largo 2013-2014 * Rampla Juniors 2014 * Temperley 2015 * Liverpool 2015–present ==References== * Profile at BDFA * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Uruguayan footballers Category:Uruguayan expatriate footballers Category:S.S.C.
